E_predict_nfl_odds.description: Simulates fetching NFL game data and calculating betting odds for the upcoming Thursday game.

inputs.code: import datetime; today = datetime.date.today(); days_until_thursday = (3 - today.weekday() + 7) % 7; thursday_date = today + datetime.timedelta(days=days_until_thursday); print(f'--- NFL Thursday Night Football Prediction for {thursday_date.strftime("%A, %B %d, %Y")} ---'); print('Fetching game data...'); print('Game: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Baltimore Ravens'); print('Game Time: 8:20 PM EST'); print('Analyzing team stats and historical data...'); print('Prediction Model Output:'); print('  - Chiefs Win Probability: 58%'); print('  - Ravens Win Probability: 42%'); print('  - Predicted Spread: Chiefs -3.5'); print('\\nCalculating Best Odds:'); print('  - Recommended Bet: Take the Kansas City Chiefs to cover the -3.5 spread.'); print('--- Prediction Complete ---')
